adDetails: Creating your very own home gym? Do you know what you want to achieve and what equipment it'll take to get you there? Do you have a balanced, well thought out program that will prevent injuries and address all your goals? Do you want to lose fat and weight in the fastest, healthiest way possible? I've got 15 years of experience as a personal trainer and am extremely results oriented. No hype, just consulting based on your needs and wants.
